Title: Requires highway projects that receive state funding to include the installation of broadband conduits and provides for access to such conduits
Summary: Requires highway projects that receive state funding to include the installation of broadband conduits suitable for fiber optic cables or wireless facilities that support broadband services; provides for access to such conduits on a competitively neutral and nondiscriminatory basis, for a charge not to exceed a cost-based rate.
LawCode: Add §23, Transp L; add §119-e, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law and the public service law, in relation to requiring highway projects that receive state funding to include the installation of broadband conduits and providing for access to such conduits
